scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo &&  cd demo &&  tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo &&  cd demo &&  tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build &&  cd demo &&  tns plugin remove nativescript-parallax &&  tns plugin add .. &&  tns install
scripts.setup: npm install && cd demo &&  npm install &&  cd .. &&  npm run build &&  cd demo &&  tns plugin add .. &&  cd ..
